TEXT.BODY: Net 33.6 mln vs 11.1 mln Revs 319.6 mln vs 295.1 mln Nine mths Net 97.3 mln vs 30.0 mln Revs 997.8 mln vs 860.0 mln NOTE: Company does not report per share earnings as it is a privately-owned concern.
